articles.title: WhatsApp now lets you hide your locked chats behind a secret code - The Verge
articles.description: WhatsApp is rolling out a new secret code feature that lets you hide your locked chats folder from your chat list. Simply type the secret code into the search bar to reveal your locked chats.
articles.content:

articles.title: Saudi wins provisional backing for Opec+ oil production cuts - Financial Times
articles.description: Expectations of production deal boost volatile prices but traders warn of quick reverse if talks collapse
articles.content:
Saudi Arabia has won provisional backing for further oil production cuts by the Opec+ group, boosting oil prices to the highest in three weeks ahead of a crucial meeting of the cartel.
